title: Stability and degradation of (oxy)nitride photocatalysts for solar water splitting
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00096J, Perspective
Open Access

Valérie Werner, Franky Bedoya Lora, Ziwei Chai, Julian Hörndl, Jakob Praxmair, Sandra Luber, Sophia Haussener, Simone Pokrant
The investigation of degradation processes provides opportunities for the stability improvement of photocatalysts and photoelectrodes. This perspective provides an overview on recent progress with a focus on (oxy)nitrides.
